scoring_breakdown.title: Scoring breakdown
scoring_breakdown.description: We scored political parties on ideas that we judge important to address the housing crisis. These ideas have been discussed and ranked internally by the members of More Montreal.
scoring_breakdown.ranking_description: Each idea has been judged and ranked on their effectiveness in solving the housing crisis. They have been divided in three groups each of them scoring differently.
scoring_breakdown.support_description: Policies points are distributed based on the kind of support the party is giving to an idea.
scoring_breakdown.half_points: Only half of the points will be added to the score.
scoring_breakdown.full_points: All of the points will be added.
scoring_breakdown.final_score_description: Parties are ranked on their total accumulated score
